feed.title: Fort St. John - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Fort St. John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:42 AM MST Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 08:00 AM MST Sunday 08 May 2016
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: WSW 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with wet snow early this morning and ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:23 AM MST Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 06:23 AM MST Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High 12. Forecast issued 06:23 AM MST Sunday 08 May 2016
